name: Elephant Sports Ball
description:
Compete against a friend in this stylish sports game. Choose from 5 unique arenas and battle it out to be the first to reach 5 goals.

How to Play

Controllers are highly recommended.  But keyboard support is available too. 

Xbox Controllers:

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Trunk

A - Jump

Right Trigger - Grab

Keyboard: Player  1

A - Left

S - Right

W - Jump

D, R, F, G - Trunk

E  - Grab 

Player  2

H - Left

J - Right

U - Jump

K, L, ;, O - Trunk

I - Grab
